titleInfo.title: Stairs in the Nathan Miller Family Home

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back: ''#501 Nathan Miller family home Leadville, Colorado Oc 1980 Credit Gay Lasher, photographer.'' On envelope: ''#501 Miller family home, Leadville.''

mods.abstract: Stairs in the Nathan Miller family home in Leadville, Colorado. A man's cap is on the banister while a cane rests against the stairs.
mods.note: Donated and photographed by Gay Lasher. Donated and photographed by Gay Lasher.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
